full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RDO RJE RNAL 'BYOR MA N'A RO MKHA' SPYOD KYI BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR THUN MONG MA YIN PA NYAMS SU LEN TSUL BYIN RLABS MYUR 'JUG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,*, ,N'A RO MKHA' SPYOD MA'I BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR DANG 'BREL PA'I GCOD YUL TSOGS BCAD MA MKHA' 'GRO'I SNYING THIG BZHUGS SO, ,
